Class EuclideSheetDisplay

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class EuclideSheetDisplay
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The basic class for displaying an EuclideSheet.

dlegland

Field Detail

selectionStroke

protected static final java.awt.Stroke selectionStroke
The stroke used to draw selected shapes

zoom

protected double zoom
Zoom level (same for x and y). zoom=1 means same scale, zoom<1 is zoom out, and zoom in is >1. Zoom equal to 0 means that zoom and position will be defined next time the paint method will be called.

pixelSnap

protected double pixelSnap
The distance, in pixels, for which the cursor is over a shape.

transform

protected java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform
user to display transform

yToTop

protected boolean yToTop
Direction of the y axis: up or bottom of the page. Up: necessary for geometric Down: 'text', 'image'

displayOffset

protected math.geom2d.Point2D displayOffset

drawMargin

protected boolean drawMargin

clipping

protected EuclideSheetDisplay.Clip clipping

getSnapDistance

public double getSnapDistance()

Returns:
